channel.title: How do i ....?
channel.description:
how do i upload a picture ive just taken with hypersnap 6??
i know how to but its a long procedure the way i do it. any1 know how to upload it direct to imagescack with hypersnap?

item.title: How do i ....?
item.dc:creator: @nicodk nicodk
item.description:
@nicodk wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:4, topic:74440”][quote author=nicodk link=topic=109320.msg1092343#msg1092343 date=1175738097]
just tell me i dont wanna register just to read something
[/quote]
You already did :P[/quote]
lol yea i did meh but i dont think ill go on offen

[quote=“serpento, post:5, topic:74440”]Did it come with a USB cord? a CD? Insert the USB into your computer. There should be a popup. Open from a Folder.
Drag it and drop the pictures into your desktop. Now its in ur comp.

If nothing happends, insert the CD. If theres no CD, go to “my computer” and look for it under the “devices with removable storage”.

If you want to upload it on the web, go to www.imageshack.us and upload it there.

if your running on a MAC, then i cant help ya.[/quote]

d’oh i forgot i could upload that way lawl

Read full topic

item.title: How do i ....?
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“serpento, post:5, topic:74440”]Did it come with a USB cord? a CD? Insert the USB into your computer. There should be a popup. Open from a Folder.
Drag it and drop the pictures into your desktop. Now its in ur comp.

If nothing happends, insert the CD. If theres no CD, go to “my computer” and look for it under the “devices with removable storage”.

If you want to upload it on the web, go to www.imageshack.us and upload it there.

if your running on a MAC, then i cant help ya.[/quote]
Hypersnap is a program, moron.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i ....?
item.dc:creator: @serpento serpento
item.description:
@serpento wrote:

Did it come with a USB cord? a CD? Insert the USB into your computer. There should be a popup. Open from a Folder.
Drag it and drop the pictures into your desktop. Now its in ur comp.

If nothing happends, insert the CD. If theres no CD, go to “my computer” and look for it under the “devices with removable storage”.

If you want to upload it on the web, go to www.imageshack.us and upload it there.

if your running on a MAC, then i cant help ya.

Read full topic
